quote: I don't understand my feelings. I really don't. I don't understand how I could hate you so much after so much time. How, no matter how much I'd like to not hate you, I hate you even more. It grows.
quote_letters: I DONT UNDERSTAND MY FEELINGS I REALLY DONT I DONT UNDERSTAND HOW I COULD HATE YOU SO MUCH AFTER SO MUCH TIME HOW NO MATTER HOW MUCH ID LIKE TO NOT HATE YOU I HATE YOU EVEN MORE IT GROWS
